english.segment1: Verse 1: The greatest day in history, Death is beaten. You have rescued me. Sing it out Jesus is alive. The empty cross, The empty grave. Life eternal You have won the day. Shout it out Jesus is alive. He's alive
english.segment2: . Chorus: Oh happy day, happy day. You washed my sin away. Oh happy day, happy day. I'll never be the same. Forever I am changed
english.segment3: . Verse 2: When I stand, in that place. Free at last, meeting face to face. I am Yours Jesus You are mine. Endless joy, perfect peace. Earthly pain finally will cease. Celebrate Jesus is alive. He's alive
english.segment4: Chorus: Oh happy day, happy day. You washed my sin away. Oh happy day, happy day. I'll never be the same OHH NO. Forever I am changed
english.segment5: . Oh what a glorious day. What a glorious way. That You have saved me. Oh what a glorious day. What a glorious name
english.segment7: . Chorus: Oh happy day, happy day. You washed my sin away. Oh happy day, happy day. I'll never be the same. Forever I am changed
english.segment8: What a glorious glorious day, I'll never be the same
